## üìä State Comparison - Total Sales (RM)

**Period:** 2024-06

### Executive Summary
Performance comparison across all 6 states.

### Evidence Used
| State        | Total Sales (RM)   |
|:-------------|:-------------------|
| Kuala Lumpur | RM 17,490.11       |
| Sabah        | RM 17,350.47       |
| Penang       | RM 16,961.05       |
| Johor        | RM 16,524.50       |
| Selangor     | RM 16,421.18       |
| Sarawak      | RM 15,105.52       |
- Data Source: Structured Sales KPI
- Rows Analyzed: 4,981

### Key Insights
- Best performing state: **Kuala Lumpur** (RM 17,490.11)
- States analyzed: Kuala Lumpur, Sabah, Penang, Johor, Selangor, Sarawak

### Next Actions
- Deep-dive into top-performing states
- Analyze regional factors affecting performance
- Share best practices across regions
